ivr.title: IV Rank / Percentile (1y lookback)
ivr.description: Corridors for IVR to guide short/long vol posture.

bands.guidance: Avoid naked shorts (vol cheap, poor RR).
Preferred zone (balanced carry).
Avoid adding shorts; hedge—elevated panic risk.

atmIv.title: ATM Implied Volatility (absolute)
atmIv.description: Absolute ATM IV level for the underlying (majors vs equities differ).

bands.label: <20% (crypto) / <15% (equities)
bands.guidance: Cheap vol; prefer defined-risk spreads/calendars over naked shorts.
Normal regime; condors/strangles attractive with prudent widths.
Stress regime; consider buying tails/hedges, scale down shorts.

termStructure.title: Term Structure (Contango vs Backwardation)
termStructure.description: Slope between short and longer tenors, used to gauge carry and risk regime.

bands.label: < −3 vol pts
bands.guidance: Backwardation: stress/hedging demand; avoid large short gamma.

bands.label: −3 to +3 vol pts
bands.guidance: Flat: neutral carry environment; size conservatively.

bands.label: ≥ +3 vol pts
bands.guidance: Contango: safer carry environment; short-vol structures favored.

skew.title: Skew (25Δ Risk Reversal, Call − Put, vol pts)
skew.description: Sign and magnitude of RR guide wing selection and overwrites.

bands.guidance: Puts rich: overweight put wings; avoid excessive downside short gamma.

bands.label: −5 to +5
bands.guidance: Balanced: symmetric structures appropriate.
Calls rich: favor call overwrites or upside-biased spreads.

volOfVol.title: Vol-of-Vol (e.g., VVIX/MOVE proxy)
volOfVol.description: Higher levels imply faster IV changes and larger tail risk.

bands.guidance: Calm regime: IV moves slower; carry trades more stable.
Normal: typical IV risk; standard position sizing.
Stressed: expect gap moves in IV; reduce short-vol exposure.

ivRv.title: IV–RV Spread
ivRv.description: Difference between implied and realized volatility; key for vol risk premium.

bands.guidance: IV below RV: buying vol has positive carry; short-vol is dangerous.

bands.label: 0–5 vol pts
bands.guidance: Mild premium: neutral to slightly favorable for selling vol.

bands.label: >5 vol pts
bands.guidance: High premium: attractive environment for short vol, subject to regime.

emHitRate.title: EM Hit Rate (90d)
emHitRate.description: Share of days where spot stayed within expected-move bands.

bands.guidance: Expected move underestimates realized range; EM may be too tight.
Balanced regime; EM roughly calibrated.
EM often contains moves; range strategies likely more robust.

rvEm.title: RV ÷ EM ratio
rvEm.description: Realized volatility divided by EM-implied volatility.

bands.guidance: Realized < EM; EM conservatively wide.
Realized close to EM; good calibration.
Realized > EM; EM underestimates moves.
Low vol regime; complacency risk.
Normal regime; standard risk posture.
High vol; expect larger equity and crypto swings.

vvix.title: VVIX Level
vvix.description: Volatility of VIX; gauge of vol-of-vol stress.

bands.guidance: Stable vol environment.
Moderate instability in IV.
Highly unstable IV; large swings likely.

funding.title: Perpetual Funding (ann.)
funding.description: Annualized funding rate on perpetual swaps.

bands.guidance: Paying heavily to be long; consider structural shorts or arbitrage.

bands.label: −10% to +10%
bands.guidance: Neutral; funding not a primary driver.
Getting paid to be long; watch for crowded positioning.

eventWindow.title: Macro Event Window
eventWindow.description: Days to next major macro event.

bands.label: >7d
bands.guidance: No major events soon; normal sizing.

bands.label: 2–7d
bands.guidance: Event in sight; gradually reduce leverage.

bands.label: <=2d
bands.guidance: Event imminent; avoid fresh short gamma.

spread.title: Bid–Ask Spread %
spread.description: Relative bid/ask width for liquid instruments.

bands.guidance: Tight market; good execution conditions.
Normal spreads; factor into edge.
Wide spreads; limit size and demand better edge.

bands.label: <$250k
bands.guidance: Thin; careful with large tickets.

bands.label: $250k–$1m
bands.guidance: Moderate depth; standard sizing.

bands.label: >$1m
bands.guidance: Deep market; comfortable sizing.

oiConcentration.title: OI Concentration %
oiConcentration.description: Share of OI concentrated near key strikes.

bands.guidance: Diffuse interest; fewer pinning effects.
Moderate concentration; watch key strikes.
High concentration; expect pinning or sharp moves around those strikes.

liquidityStress.title: Liquidity Stress
liquidityStress.description: Spread and depth based stress proxy.

bands.guidance: Normal; standard sizing.
Stressed; reduce leverage and widen limits.
Severe stress; pause aggressive strategies.

condorCreditEm.title: Condor Credit % of EM
condorCreditEm.description: Credit received vs expected move size.

bands.guidance: Thin credit; require strong regime confirmation.
Balanced risk/reward for iron condors.
Rich credit; attractive if regime is benign.
Good RR; comfortable for core allocation.
Acceptable RR; size more cautiously.
Poor RR; avoid unless edge is exceptional.

pnlVsCredit.title: PnL vs Credit %
pnlVsCredit.description: Realized PnL relative to initial credit.

bands.guidance: Losing strategy; reassess entry and filters.
Moderate performance; monitor risk.
Strong performance; regime favorable.

deltaExposure.title: Delta Exposure % NAV
deltaExposure.description: Directional exposure of the options portfolio vs NAV.

bands.guidance: Neutral; within typical risk budget.
Elevated; ensure conviction on direction.
High directional; consider trimming.
Low convexity; short gamma dominated.
Balanced gamma/theta.
High convexity; PnL sensitive to intraday moves.

fillRatio.title: Fill Ratio %
fillRatio.description: Share of orders filled vs submitted.

bands.guidance: Execution issues; review pricing and urgency.
Acceptable; room to improve.
Healthy; good tuning of order logic.

arrivalSlippage.title: Arrival Slippage (ticks)
arrivalSlippage.description: Difference between arrival price and execution.

bands.label: <1 tick
bands.guidance: Excellent execution quality.

bands.label: 1–3 ticks
bands.guidance: Normal slippage; acceptable.

bands.label: >3 ticks
bands.guidance: Large slippage; revisit execution strategy.

breakage.title: Breakage Rate %
breakage.description: Rate of failed/cancelled orders causing opportunity loss.

bands.guidance: Healthy; issues are rare.
Moderate; investigate mechanical failures.
High; fix infra or execution logic.

capitalUtil.title: Capital Util % NAV
capitalUtil.description: Usage of margin vs NAV for strategy.

bands.guidance: Low usage; room to scale if risk is acceptable.
Comfortable utilization zone.
High utilization; limited capacity for shocks.

edgeCapture.title: Edge Capture %
edgeCapture.description: Realized edge versus quoted/expected edge at trade time.

bands.guidance: Capturing less than half of expected edge; inspect execution.
Decent capture; room for refinement.
Strong capture; pipeline works well.
Shallow drawdowns; within normal noise.
Moderate; review but likely within plan.
Deep; check regime and risk budget.

boxFinancingSpread.title: Box Financing Spread (bps)
boxFinancingSpread.description: Implied financing vs cost of capital.

bands.guidance: Borrow is cheap; long box trades may be attractive.
Neutral; only trade when technicals are favorable.
Rich implied financing; exploit via box structures.

boxSlippage.title: Box Slippage (ticks)
boxSlippage.description: Execution slippage across four legs of a box.

bands.guidance: Tight slippage; good execution.
Manageable; monitor but acceptable.
High friction; reduce size or avoid.

basis.title: Basis (annualized %)
basis.description: Spot–perpetual basis scaled to annual terms.

bands.guidance: Negative basis; better to be long perps vs spot.

bands.label: −10% to +10%
bands.guidance: Neutral; basis carry minor.
Positive basis; basis trades attractive.

tsKink.title: Term Structure Kink (abs, vol pts)
tsKink.description: Local curvature vs smooth fit; large kinks often coincide with stress/regime change.

bands.guidance: Flat: smooth term structure; signals align with carry.
Curved: caution; prefer defined-risk or smaller sizing.
Kinked: potential stress; avoid aggressive short vol.
